@VSBEngagement And trust me, when you are considering closing our kids' schools, far more than 7% of us want to talk to you! #bced #bcpoli
@VSBEngagement And that's assuming (wrongly) no past/future students or community members want to participate. #bced
Dear @VSBEngagement I did some math for you: 3 consults * 4 hours * 15 speakers/hour = 180 slots / 2644 affected students = <7% of students
@VSBEngagement This is NOT meaningful consultation with affected families and communities. #bced
Really upset about the fact that the @VSBEngagement town halls sold out before they were supposed to be open for registration #bced
